column1: Baby Barnaby's////The hostess that day was not so pleased that we needed an outdoor table (although I had called ahead and explained our situation and she confirmed that they were cleaning up the outdoor seating after the breakfast rush and a table would be ready in "10 minutes"). Â Once we arrived
column2: she changed her story and said she wasn't sure she could let us sit outside if it was sprinkling because the "server might get wet"
column3: which is funny because we couldn't see any uncovered portion of the building from the restaurant to the covered patio but sure...begrudgingly
column4: she eventually decided to seat us.
